sources.title: The Hitch Hikers (1947)
sources.description: The boys are trying to hitch a ride with no luck. They see a car parked in front of a bank with the door open. They jump in against the driver's will, and a bank tobber runs out and jumps into his escape car, too. The boys get more of a ride than they wanted. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-hitch-hikers-1947/

metadata.Plot: Hitch-hikers Heckle and Jeckle manage to get a lift in a car that turns out to be a getaway vehicle for an armed robber.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
